title: AR Technology-Utilized Mathematics Education Content Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic experience with digital tool usage
context.additional_context: Practical AR-Based Math Content Design Course for Educators: Hands-On Training with HP Reveal/Blippar Tools

learning_goals: One can visualize mathematical concepts (geometry, functions, etc.) in three-dimensional space using AR technology.
One can improve learner engagement by over 30% through the design of interactive AR content.
Teams can develop AR-based mathematics education modules using a PBL approach and evaluate their applicability in real-world settings.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
